Lang.new 02/10/2009

Well, thanks to Juca, I've joined an online community called busuu, which is basically a group of people helping each other to learn other languages.

So I've decided to learn (or get better) italian, french, german and spanish!

I'll probably fail miserably, but it's rather easy to get started on any of those and a bunch of other languages.
